author: ​Special Correspondent​
title: COVID-19 | Odisha Assembly asked to stay under home quarantine as State reports third case
description: A 60-year-old man who has tested positive for novel coronavirus has visited the dispensary at the State Assembly recently.
content:
The staff members of Odisha Assembly have been directed to stay under home quarantine after it was learnt that a 60-year-old man who has tested positive for COVID-19 had visited the the dispensary of the State Assembly recently.
The man is now undergoing tre… [+2597 chars]
